Package cz.vse.java.util.userData

Class UserProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.vse.java.util.userData.UserProperties
  • public class UserProperties
extends java.lang.Object

    Class UserProperties is Singleton by design pattern definition with only one possible instance of this class.

    The class has Thread-safe getInstance() creation mechanism implemented to be sure there is only one instance.

    Written for project "Connections2".
    Version:
    03. 04. 2020
    Author:
    Vojtěch Pavlů
    See Also:
    Singleton at Wikipedia

      • getInstance

        public static UserProperties getInstance()

        Static Singleton method getInstance for returning the only instance of the class of UserProperties.

        Thread-safe implementation of getInstance() method to prevent more instance creation while using multithreading algorithm.

        Returns:
        the only instance of the UserProperties class
        See Also:
        Singleton at Wikipedia, Thread safety at Wikipedia, Thread

      • reset

        public static void reset()

        Resets the static field of singletonInstance to default state - it is set to null again.

        ALL SET DATA ARE GONNA BE REMOVED
